h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Boar After the Crouching Tiger Temple
content: Instead, look to the slope on the right when you first enter the area, to see him standing waiting. Approach him, and he won't be too happy about you having the gold piece, sparking a duel between the two of you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Boar After the Crouching Tiger Temple'.
The content is as follows:
Instead, look to the slope on the right when you first enter the area, to see him standing waiting. Approach him, and he won't be too happy about you having the gold piece, sparking a duel between the two of you.
